Gold.en: An attack that may cause paralysis.

Silver.en: An attack that may cause paralysis.

Crystal.en: An attack that may cause paralysis.

Ruby.en: A full-body slam that may cause paralysis.

Sapphire.en: A full-body slam that may cause paralysis.

Emerald.en: A full-body slam that may cause paralysis.

FireRed.en: The user drops its full body on the foe. It may leave the foe paralyzed.
FireRed.de: Trifft den Gegner mit vollem Körpereinsatz. Bewirkt evtl. Paralyse.

LeafGreen.en: The user drops its full body on the foe. It may leave the foe paralyzed.
LeafGreen.de: Trifft den Gegner mit vollem Körpereinsatz. Bewirkt evtl. Paralyse.

Diamond.en: The user drops onto the foe with its full body weight. It may leave the foe paralyzed.
Diamond.de: Trifft den Gegner mit vollem Körpereinsatz. Bewirkt eventuell Paralyse.

Pearl.en: The user drops onto the foe with its full body weight. It may leave the foe paralyzed.
Pearl.de: Trifft den Gegner mit vollem Körpereinsatz. Bewirkt eventuell Paralyse.

Black.en: The user drops onto the target with its full body weight. It may also leave the target with paralysis.
Black.de: Trifft das Ziel mit vollem Körpereinsatz. Bewirkt eventuell Paralyse.
